data.title: Pet Friendly Entire Home
data.meta_description: Sierra Lodge Myoko is a pet-friendly entire home rental located in Myoko Kogen, Japan. Surrounded by 10 ski resorts, onsens, and the deepest snow in Japan, book your dream vacation at Sierra Lodge today!
data.text:
Sierra Lodge is much more than a place to crash after a day on the slopes.

Relax in the premium massage chair, enjoy a game of chess or X-box, and settle in for a Netflix movie night before falling into one of the lodge's extra comfortable western beds. Spend quality time with quality people (and a pretty awesome dog).

Accommodating up to 10 guests at a time, Sierra Lodge Myoko is the perfect entire home rental for your group's mountain vacation.

Centrally located in the heart of Myoko Kogen, Sierra Lodge is just a 5 minute drive from the Akakura and Ikenotaira resorts. With Suginohara & Seki Onsen just 10 minutes away, and access to Lotte Arai, Tangram, and Madarao within 25 minutes, the best powder skiing and snowboarding in the world is at your fingertips.

Whether it's floating through bottomless powder, hiking through lush forests, or swimming in pristine waters, we love Myoko, all year long.

I'm Donald and this is Sierra, and we're thrilled to welcome you to our favorite place on earth. Originally from Southern California, I moved to Japan in 2013 and have resided full time in Myoko since 2017. Sierra, the namesake of the lodge, joined me in Myoko in 2020 when she was just 8 weeks old. Together, we love nothing more than sharing this special part of the world with old and new friends.

As a lifelong skier and former GS Racer, I've had the privilege to ski all over the world. From Canada to Europe, Niseko to Nozawa, I can tell you that there really isn't anywhere on earth quite like Myoko.

​

Whether you're coming to experience Japan's snowiest ski region or are simply looking for a retreat to the tranquility of the Japanese countryside, this rare and special place has something for everyone.

​

Located on a large plot of land, and directly connected to Myoko's renowned hiking trails, Sierra Lodge is the perfect pet-friendly 4 season getaway for you and your pack, both human and canine alike.
